clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Functional Status and Mental Functions of Adult Cerebral Palsy Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Functional Status and Mental Functions of Adult Cerebral Palsy Patients

brief_summary.textblock: In adult cerebral palsy patients , a questionnaire study will be conducted to determine the functional level and to determine the effect on quality of life. In this survey, age, gender, demographic information of the patient, as well as additional diseases which can be seen together with cerebral palsy will be questioned.

detailed_description.textblock: In adult patients diagnosed with cerebral palsy, a questionnaire study will be conducted to determine the functional level and to determine the effect on quality of life. In this survey, age, gender, demographic information of the patient, as well as additional diseases which can be seen together with cerebral palsy will be questioned. There are studies about the functional status of adults with CP in the literature; However, there is no study conducted on this subject in our country. In this study, it was aimed to evaluate the functional status and mental functions of adults with CP who applied to our hospital.

intervention.description: Survey includes age, gender, cerebral palsy type, education, mental status, working status, living conditions, comorbidities, pain, spasticity, contractures, deformities, mobility status and gross motor function classification system level

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- >18 years old
- Diagnosed with cerebral palsy
- Who voluntarily participate the study
Exclusion Criteria:

- Who does not give permission to participate the study
